thread.title: Millennials are saving — but they’re doing it wrong
thread.title_full: Millennials are saving — but they’re doing it wrong - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: Millennials are saving — but they’re doing it wrong
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE Growing up during an economic downturn scared 20-somethings into saving — but they’re also too skittish to do much with the money they’re socking away. See full story.
6 things Donald Trump doesn’t know about immigration In his wholesale characterization of Mexicans as criminals, Donald Trump recycled oft-repeated misconceptions about immigration and illegal immigrants that are motivated by racism and often unravel under scrutiny. See full story.
And the winner of the GOP debate is…Facebook Facebook reports 20 million interactions on the platform Thursday night that are directly related to the GOP debate. See full story.
Raging Northern California wildfire could destroy $200 million worth of homes Almost 1,000 homes are at high risk, real estate firm says. See full story.
Want a job? These two industries are desperate for talent If you’re hunting for a job, it may be time to switch industries. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
